divs: Sighting DetailsI heard my dogs barking on my back pourch. Thinking it was a rat I ran outside and looked in my backyard from my pourch. I didn't see anything and glanced up and saw a white, dim object slowly moving across the sky. It was northeast from my house. First I thought it was an aircraft but did not strobe white, green, and red. It seemed very far away and thought it was a satilite but it was not clear last night and my pourch light was on. Suddenly the object seperated into two pieces. One piece going upward and one going down. I was pretty surprised so I ran inside and told my wife and my mother-in-law. They just took it lightly. Unfortunaly I don't have a great camera and I was probably the only witness. I'm posting this to see if anyone else has seen this same event.
Summary: Slow moving light breaks into two objects, one goes up, and one goes down.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Houma
There were no other sightings in Houma on or around March 19th 2010
